titleStmt.title: Prophetica, sive, De sacra et vnica ratione concionandi tractatus
titleStmt.author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.

publicationStmt.publisher: Ex officina Johannis Legatt, celeberrimæ Academiæ Cantabrigiensis typographi,

notesStmt.note: Imprints vary, but all are dated 1631.
